summary: Changes the female bards in Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Hi guys! So, I really hate writting descriptions because I'm not good at all doing that (also English isn't my native language haha). 

I'm sharing this mod because like most of you, I use those great Bijin mods, but I miss some women they haven't replaced so I decided to do my own. 

I'm still planning to create more NPC's and I'll be sharing with you in time :)

For now, check out some of my other mods if you like it ;) Thanks!

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89494]Lagertha from Vikings Racemenu Preset
[/url]﻿
